Hello World

17 Mar 2015

My name is Nate. I work for Custom Bit as a rails/iOS developer while attending university. I'll graduate at the end of this year with a bachelor's degree in computer science.

This site is powered by Jekyll and GitHub Pages. I followed this tutorial pretty closely which introduced me to Poole which I highly recommend. I am using the Hyde theme with almost zero customizations.
